definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: You are cordially invited to a reception to be given in our ministry on Saturday evening.
sentences.chinese: 诚恳邀请参加我部本星期六晚间举行的招待会。

sentences.english: Women only cars are available late at night and during the morning rush hour.
sentences.chinese: 女性专车仅在晚间和早晨高峰时间提供。

sentences.english: The talent show in the evening drew the curtain with guitar playing.
sentences.chinese: 晚间的才艺表演在吉它的弹唱中拉开序幕。

sentences.english: Robins were sprinkling the evening air with flute-like whistles.
sentences.chinese: 知更鸟用长笛般的鸣声泼溅着晚间的空气。

sentences.english: In addition to three meals, you can all snacks in the afternoon and evening time.
sentences.chinese: 除了三顿饭，可以在下午和晚间各加餐一次。

sentences.english: I heard that the anchorman of the DBD TV network's evening news got fired.
sentences.chinese: 我听说DBD电视网的晚间新闻主播被炒鱿鱼。

sentences.english: And then eating two Mini Magnums during Newsnight.
sentences.chinese: 然后在晚间新闻的时候吃上两小酒瓶。

sentences.english: The prelude of the night is commenced in the music of the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 晚间的序幕于夕阳的乐曲声中揭开。

sentences.english: The television anchorman was reporting evening news.
sentences.chinese: 这位男电视主持人正在报道晚间新闻。

sentences.english: He was awaiting arraignment last night.
sentences.chinese: 周三晚间他在等待传讯。

sentences.english: In the evening, I lazily walked on the streets of Magung City.
sentences.chinese: 晚间时分，我慵懒地在马公市的街头散步。

sentences.english: By 9.35pm guests there were trapped and in panic.
sentences.chinese: 晚间9点35分，惊慌失措的顾客们被困在酒店中。

sentences.english: The open-air restaurant offers excellent food with nightly live music.
sentences.chinese: 露天餐厅里，你可以边享美食，边听晚间直播音乐。

sentences.english: In late 2008, the Asia-Pacific Space Co-operation Organisation launched in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 在2008晚间，亚太空间合作组织于北京启动。

sentences.english: The violent films are forbidden to be shown between 7 pm and 9 pm the prime time.
sentences.chinese: 禁止暴力影片在晚间7点至9点的黄金时段放映。

sentences.english: During the night following the earthquake, 19 aftershocks were reported by the GeoNet website.
sentences.chinese: 地震发生当天晚间，地理网又报告了19次余震。

definition: very early in the morning/in the wee hours
